history.content: {"status": "need_clarification", "assistant_message": "I need to know the size and position of the square.", "questions": ["What is the side length of the square?", "Where should the square be positioned on the XY plane (e.g., centered at origin or specific coordinates)?"], "plan": [], "actions": [], "requires_confirmation": false}
